snippet: Shareholders in Zenefits, a troubled human resources company, will get larger stakes as it tries to make up for the former chief executive’s unlawful corner-cutting....
abstract: Zenefits announces agreement in which investors will receive larger piece of company, which will cut its valuation to around $2 billion; company's sales team sidestepped health insurance regulations in some markets in order to boost growth, which resulted in investors overpaying for portions of company they received.

byline.original: By KATIE BENNER and MIKE ISAAC

lead_paragraph: Shareholders in Zenefits, a troubled human resources company, will get larger stakes as it tries to make up for the former chief executive’s unlawful corner-cutting.

headline.main: Zenefits Compensates Investors Over Past Misconduct
headline.print_headline: Zenefits Compensates Investors Over Former Chief’s Past Misconduct
